pros: Made with steel and tough plastic for durability, this is a timeless truck that can go inside and out
Bed is sizable enough for loading up with all sorts of stuff
cons: Some disappointment that despite being described as “classic,” it’s not all steel

customer_reviews.title: New Wave Tonka Steel Mighty Dump Truck - Kind of Steel - Mostly Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's 4th birthday. He loves running it through the house. As for being a replica of the steel version from years ago? Well it looks like it is but really only the bed is metal. The cab, wheels, undercarriage, and well basically everything else is sturdy plastic. Hey, at least it won't rust much right?
customer_reviews.author: Patrick McClure

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is. not whats i expecting there’ a lot of o difference in sizes i have an old tonka and it is double the size and way more sturdy and durable this is disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: This is the only new Tonka worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: This is the only new Tonka truck that's still worth something. I bought almost every retro Tonka available and they're all junk. At least the bed on this dump truck is all metal and can handle some weight. My daughter was playing with all of her new Tonkas in the front yard the other day. At one point she had this dump truck over flowing with dirt. Just like how I remember playing with them. I just wish I could say the same for the other cranes and tractors.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Yay! Tonka is still the best
customer_reviews.text: Bought Tonka trucks for both my kids, nearly 50 years ago! Always guaranteed to be the best made toys around. So, new 'baby' about 18mos old comes to a reunion party and I remembered the joy my kids had with the BIG truck. This little boy was self entertained for the longest time, having a ball pushing it around, sitting his little diapered bottom in the truck bed and scooting around backwards in it. A big hit, as I knew it would be. I think the product description mentions 'age 3', but my experience in the now (and then) is that Tonka is so well made that they are basically safe for any age.
customer_reviews.author: D. Petty

customer_reviews.title: Here he is setting on it and having so much fun. My son said it reminded him of the ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson just received this today from me. My son said it's made very well and that my grandson loves it. Here he is setting on it and having so much fun. My son said it reminded him of the one he had in the 80's as a little boy. Thank you so much for a great truck! Many years of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can't tell you how many of these we've bought!
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how many of these we've bought. You have to buy the Tonka Classic trucks, they are so well made. The kids at our school use them every single day! Wow do they love them! Well made, tough as heck, they hold up to every day use. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: crazy old man

customer_reviews.title: Nice Classic Tonka Truck!
customer_reviews.text: My child LOVES her Tonka Classic Steel Mighty Dump Truck! Though, I have to say the quality is still not nearly as amazing as the one I had as a child, but still better than other trucks you might find on the market today. My child loves to drive this truck all over our house and it hold's her toys! The wheels, bumper, and underside of the truck are ALL plastic. Though, Tonka still does a nice classic truck!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Mom

customer_reviews.title: Product Name is Misleading - Only Bed is Steel.  Still a Sturdy Truck!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this for my young son, and thought based on the description that it would be built of mostly steel based on the name and the description line of "Built Tonka tough with sturdy steel construction". The next line notes that dump bed is steel - what they don't mention is this is the only part made of steel. The rest of the body is made of plastic. That said, I am not disappointed by the product received. It is still a sturdy truck and I expect it will be enjoyed by the little one for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous toy! Much bigger and stronger, durable than I expected. This will last a very long time. My four year old grandson loves it and was eager to show it to me as soon as I walked in the door. Good for play inside and out. Will hold plenty of sand, gravel, toy soldiers or whatever. Excellent quality. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: elaineTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: The strongest long last longing toy you’ll ever buy!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly my kids are THE hardest on things. They climbed on, filled it with snow, ice, mud, dirt, rocks and grass. The thing doesn’t even have paint chipping on it. With the amount of toys they have broken, I am surprised they’ve lasted fours years (we have two) and they look like the day we bout them, minus some wear on the tires. I love them so much and they make great as gifts, for your kids, grandkids, heck if your into playing in the mud, adults can get them too! They are definitely built to last!
customer_reviews.author: Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Awesome truck
customer_reviews.text: We've been getting the Tonka steel trucks for a couple years now. We have three of these my son has gotten as gifts and we have gifted one. -they are durable, my kids ride them and push each other from 2 years to 6 years of age. -they work great in doors and outdoors -they've been left outdoors in snow, rain, wind and sun and little issues. -so far we've had no issues, not even a squeeky lift.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Well-loved Classic Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected, well packaged, quick shipping, average price for the item. My kids had big, metal Tonkas these when they were small. It was one of their favorite toys and stood up to a lot of hard use in the gravel driveway. I've gotten them for each of my grandsons now -- this one for the little one's 3rd birthday -- and they love them too! This toy is on the short list of all-time best toys, up there with sticks, rocks, boxes, and Lego!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy truck that your child will love
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. I had one as a kid and I wanted to get him one. He’s a toddler and he’s pretty rough with stuff right now but this thing has held up nicely. There are no sharp edges on it and it rolls easily. It isn’t so intricately detailed that it can’t be washed and brought inside either so he can use all the time. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: W. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Tonka Truck
customer_reviews.text: I got the truck yesterday and am thrilled. This is a great truck. My son had one that lasted forever. I was afraid this would not be of the same quality but was pleasantly surprised to find that it is as I remembered, sturdy, well built, bright and shiny, just what a little boy will love. And it has a lifetime warranty. It's a toy that I have given to every little boy in our family. A classic
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frankie Loved It
customer_reviews.text: My brother's grandson, Frankie, loved this when he got it at a family dinner this fall. He will turn 2 soon and he could not stop shaking with happiness while it was removed form the box. He spent the next 2 hours pushing it around the retirement community's lobby. My 95 YO mother got the right gift for him, Frankie is a big truck lover. The Tonka Dump Truck is well built, can handle a little boy sitting on it, and looks like it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: RStauffer

customer_reviews.title: Cheapo plastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter, so excited for her to get her 1st Tonka truck. When I felt how light the box was I already knew it was going to be crappy. Sure enough, it is a cheapo, lightweight, plastic toy made in China. I paid 25 bucks for it and it probably cost 50 cents to make. Im going to find another toy brand and give the Tonka away. Tonka you suck!!!
customer_reviews.author: adam j

customer_reviews.title: Four generations of Tonka Boys!
customer_reviews.text: When our great nephew started walking we bought him a small set of tonka trucks, now that he is older He was ready for the big stuff! This truck is very well made and will last for generations! Thanks for keeping the tradition alive Tonka!
customer_reviews.author: Elysian

customer_reviews.title: VERY sturdy toys!!
customer_reviews.text: My son enjoyed 50+ years ago and 2 year old Twin Greatgrandsons loved Tonka toys and found new way to enjoy the dump trick! Still well built, fortunately, and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Pat

customer_reviews.title: A great Tonka for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have bought because my kids love this and I ran it over with my car. That being said my kids slam this with rocks and run it into things and it is fine. It took me crushing it with my car. Worth replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Teal

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, realistic fun, and the price was nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is, of course, a quality product. I have been buying Tonka products since I was a little girl and the quality is a testament to the company's dedication to building a toy that can withstand some incredible abuse. We bought this for our grandson's 7th birthday and he has put it through some tough "job sites" in our yard. Rolling down mountains of gravel, crashing into trees, being loaded with tons of rock and dirt, and even as a seat for our grandson when he needed a break.
customer_reviews.author: RBell66

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - STEEL where it counts - Lifetime warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and a backhoe for my 5 yr old Grandson, partly for his birthday (and partly because I accidently stepped on his plastic backhoe and broke it) These trucks are all steel where it counts very tough and BIG, just like Tonka was back in the 70's, I have 3 grandsons and these were a big hit even over the electronic toys, their Dad's liked them as well. These also have a lifetime warranty so you really cant go wrong - if your children like trucks they will LOVE these, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Can't knock the classic
customer_reviews.text: My son is 18 months, but he loves this thing. He pushes it everywhere and will only put certain toys in it - if you try to put other say hot wheels in the back, he gets mad and throws em out. The quality is top notch - because after he and his sister have rammed it into the walls, the toy is fine - the walls not so much. My landlord will love me. My next review will surely be spackle.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hill

customer_reviews.title: My little boy loves this truck
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this truck. He can get rough with his toys but this withstands everything he’s put it though. Definitely recommend it! Might have to buy another once little brother is big enough to play! Only negative of the truck is that it hurts bad when rammed into ankles.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Tonka Quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Tonka, I don’t need to say more but I will. Same quality I remember as a kid. Sturdy metal construction. Totally giftable, great addition to the ever growing collection of trucks our son has.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It is worth it
customer_reviews.text: First we were surprised at the size of it, and how solid it was built. It made a small boy very happy, who had to get outside in the dirt with it. Must give it 5 stars for the sturdiness of this toy truck.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not a Tonka product
customer_reviews.text: This is not a Tonka truck as pictured on the Amazon site. As you can see from my picture it is a CAT product from a company called Funrise. I was deceived by the picture and product description. I could have purchased this same product at Walmart! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Pamela F

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy Tanka & expect it to stand up to kid play.
customer_reviews.text: Much of the metal has been replaced with plastic & not the hard durable plastic they were using but a floppy bendy plastic that won't hold up to active kid play. Don't buy Tonka. If they can't make a quality toy like they used to they need to close up shop! & don't encourage these sellers who jack up the prices on the old Tonkas that were made when durability was the standard. Toys should be played with by kids not hoarded by misfit adults
customer_reviews.author: Theodore

customer_reviews.title: A toy that will last even with the roughest and toughest
customer_reviews.text: My children ride this thing around and it still works. It is an inside only toy but i would be confident that it would survive outside. It is steel so it will be rusted if left exposed. if you can keep it inside then it will last a really long time no matter how its played with.
customer_reviews.author: Ventura Family

customer_reviews.title: A true classic!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Even though I bought it for the kids I could not resist getting down on my hand and knees, filling the back with sand, and then dumping it. I am sure if anyone was watching they would have seen me grinning ear to ear! This classic toy will be used on a beach adjacent to a saltwater bay. I am curious to see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Z.

customer_reviews.title: My Grandkids love TONKA
customer_reviews.text: Not as well made as when I was a boy in the 70's, the trucks do in fact have metal parts, although much of the truck is now plastic. Regardless, TONKA trucks are my grandkids favorite toys and they always ask to play with them when they come over.
customer_reviews.author: A Partent

customer_reviews.title: It's a Tonka
customer_reviews.text: It's a Tonka, what else do I need to say? I had them for my boys, and now for my grandkids. They are sturdy, fun, versatile. Kids can push their little siblings in them, cart other toys, sand, dirt. They never wear out, just get faded from the son and rain.
customer_reviews.author: M Elder

customer_reviews.title: Still made Tonka Tough!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been setting outside in the rain and snow and still performs like a champ. He plays with it in the backyard puts rocks and dirt in it and still keeps on working. Best gift for any little one wanting a dump truck.
customer_reviews.author: senaido cabral

customer_reviews.title: Great for little boys!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a little boy's birthday, and he loved it. (I guess he slept with it in bed that night, so cute) It is just like the one I had growing up. I grabbed two, one for my daughter, and hers has been outside in a mud puddle for months and it looks like it is holding up pretty well. Can't beat a Tonka Truck.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: NOT ALL STEEL
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the fact that some this is a steel classic Tonka truck . I remember back when I was a kid my truck lasted me for years. NOW most of these truck are made with plastic. So with the being said the only part of this truck is steel is the dump bed and rest is PLASTIC.
customer_reviews.author: curley hines

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you would expect from Tonka!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my three year old grandson and he loves it. It has a sold metal body, extremely durable. I am very impressed with the craftsmanship of this Tonka Truck. Will definitely purchase another one soon, as I have four more grandsons that will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hargenrader

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the one I had as a kid. My son LOVES this dump truck. And when he drops it on my toe, it hurts just as much now as it did when I was a kid. Very sturdy and very easy to clean. He likes to use it in the sandbox. It has also spent the night outside in the rain a couple times with no rust
customer_reviews.author: LCwell

customer_reviews.title: Could be a collector. Better paint and seems more quiet due to durability
customer_reviews.text: Just as I expected. Metal and real nice quality by Tonka. Some plastics and the paint feels really good semi gloss. Not easy to scratch. Durable paint job. I’m looking for another truck to buy my son since this one so nice.
customer_reviews.author: TioJam

customer_reviews.title: Tonka "Steel" Mighty
customer_reviews.text: The only part that is steel is the bed and the axles. All the rest is plastic. The part that I spied as "engineered for a short lifespan" is where the axles are snapped into a thin plastic sheet on each side. I was rough on my toys when I was a kid and I would have destroyed this in about a month. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: J. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: "I....LOVE IT  said my 4 year old Grandson
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my grandson He loves that the truck really dumps. He fills it with all kinds of items and pushes the all over the property. Going through big muddy puddles are the best. Not all metal like the original Tonka's but still very sturdy and built for years of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L. Cragle

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as the original
customer_reviews.text: My rough and tumble grandson is big into trucks, and this was the sturdiest I could find. Not quite the same ruggedness of the Tonkas made years ago, but still I good toy for destructive little boys. While the bed is steel, the tires are now plastic instead of rubber.
customer_reviews.author: ilookfamous

customer_reviews.title: A classic
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson, essentially the same thing I had in the 1960s, classic little boy toy. Great alternative to all the plastic junk out there that just becomes clutter, these last for many year of hard outdoor play.
customer_reviews.author: Sbehr

customer_reviews.title: Love this Dump Truck!!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this Tonka dump truck for my nephew. It was his first birthday. My son got one years ago for his first birthday and he use to sit in the back and scoot himself around. He's almost 11 now and that same dump truck is still sitting outside in the yard. It's durable and still gets played with. It looks old but it still works just as great!
customer_reviews.author: Jaminite

customer_reviews.title: Love the truck.
customer_reviews.text: Love these little trucks, it is my go to gift for kids around 2. They have so much fun with them out in the yard. The bed is metal so I feel it is quite sturdy and I don't get that anxiety about it falling apart after a year or so. I feel this is always a good purchase for boys or girls. I mean 2 or 3 year olds live to push around trucks together regardless of gender.
customer_reviews.author: O'Doherty FamilyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Kid, Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great product to buy the kids. Classic Tonka made out of metal like they should be. Fast shipping and arrival. Gave to my son as a Christmas present, and needless to say he loves it. Going on two years since we had it maybe more and it is still in perfect condition. A strong toy for sure , just how I remember tonka as a kid.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Long Lasting and Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down still one of the greatest toys ever made. My kids run them around our house constantly. It is practically indestructible and can carry whatever their little hands can put in the back. We have some outside in the dirt and some inside for the floor. These dump trucks are still mostly metal, and the plastic parts are very sturdy. I recommend this to anyone with kids.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Tonka provides the Christmas magic.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to donate to Toys for Tots this year as a way to thank Tonka for going the extra mile to provide a specific discontinued Tonka toy Hummer to a lovely sister trying to find one for her autistic (?) brother. Tonka really came through in a big way. It was all over Reddit this season, my favorite Christmas story. Redditors came through in a big way too.
customer_reviews.author: 773MXVW

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy toddler truck
customer_reviews.text: This truck is amazing. My toddler loves this truck and sits in it all the time. We have a sand pit and he shovels sand into it and dumps it out. He has dropped it several times and it is still in great shape. I would highly recommend this truck to any toddler who loves trucks.
customer_reviews.author: jaileigh

customer_reviews.title: Easily the most stable and sturdy toy I have as a mother of four!
customer_reviews.text: Easily the most stable and sturdy toy I have as a mother of four! My two year old plays with this every day and it has held up to his constant abuse. Love tonka and will absolutely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Manager of Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: Tough and Fun
customer_reviews.text: These tough trucks have been so loved and beaten to death by my 2 and 3 yr old grandsons....pushed endlessly around the neighborhood, thrown off the deck, filled with rocks and sand, tossed into the lake.....and the trucks take it and come back for more!
customer_reviews.author: EJK

customer_reviews.title: Impressive truck!
customer_reviews.text: Wow I was amazed at how well made this truck is! It's also big. I was expecting the plastic bottom from all the reviews and that was ok with me. This is an impressive looking truck and I am super happy with it. I'm using it for an Easter Basket for my 2 year old grandson who is mad for dump trucks. I know he will be totally thrilled with this!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this truck for a landscape project that I am working on. Although it is larger than I wanted, it will work great. I wanted the metal as opposed to plastic. This is metal is sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and realistic
customer_reviews.text: My newborn “bought this” as a present for big brother when she came home. My sOn has LOVED it every day since. It’s a big hit with toddlers to push around on play dates and for the infant to dump stuff 😂 Very sturdy! Would work inside out outside.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAR815

customer_reviews.title: Made a 6 year old happy
customer_reviews.text: It's a Tonka. It's got good construction, and looks like it's supposed to. It's not all steel like the old days, but nothing is made as good as it was in the old days. I was happy enough with this truck.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D. Mathison

customer_reviews.title: Nice Throwback Toy
customer_reviews.text: It shocked me to find steel Tonka trucks are still around. I had great fun with mine as a kid in the 60s. I bought this one for my 3 y/o grandson for Christmas, and he loves it. It's rugged and does everything the old-school versions of my childhood did. Both Grampy and Grandson are pleased with it. Now I'll simply have to keep buying him more -- a Grampy's gotta do what a Grampy's gotta do.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H.

customer_reviews.title: A LITTLE BOYS RITE OF PASSAGE !
customer_reviews.text: This year my grandson's first big Tonka Truck...and he played with it more than anything else.. it is a little boys rite of passage to get his first steel Tonka truck, the big One! My son kept talking about his... we all watched and I remembered nothing but my son and the escaped when Mr. Toad when into the cab, and puffed himself up and could not come out.... he even had his little feets on the steering wheel.. I screamed til the neighbors heard me, and my son but the Truck In the shade til Daddy got home...by that time, Mr.Toad unpuffed and crawled out... we still have that truck... some 30 years old.!
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Hein

customer_reviews.title: It'a Back!!
customer_reviews.text: A real truck. My grandson loves it. His Grandpa had one over 50 years ago and I thought I would never be able to find this fine toy again. All grandmothers out these grab them.
customer_reviews.author: RJW

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for kids who love heavy machinery
customer_reviews.text: I miss the good old days when these things were all metal, but I can't complain about the durability. Our five and three year old children sit in the dump bed and ride around, and this thing holds up nicely. Tonka has been a family favorite for generations, and I'm glad my kids can enjoy them too.
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddyDK

customer_reviews.title: Still Tonka Tough but Different
customer_reviews.text: I bought this truck for my 2.5 year old granddaughter and she really likes it. Of course it’s not all metal like the trucks of yesteryear nor is it made in the USA any longer but this is the 21st Century. Only the bed is metal but the truck is still durable and should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: BSB

customer_reviews.title: Half steel, half plastic
customer_reviews.text: Not solid steel like I expected but it is great and my 2yo loves it!!! He takes it all over the place! Only the dump bed is steel. The rest is plastic of that matters!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected it to be
customer_reviews.text: The original tonal truck was much bigger and cost less. This one has much more plastic then the original tonal trucks. Still cute and still works
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Lebow Smith

customer_reviews.title: My Nephew loves it
customer_reviews.text: The look on his face was priceless, I won't tell you what he said about it but he is still trying to figure out how to make a "T" sound at the beginning of a word instead of an "F"
customer_reviews.author: chewbacca

customer_reviews.title: There’s a reason Tonka-Tough is a phrase
customer_reviews.text: This thing would survive the apocalypse let alone an aggressive child. Back in the 80s I once rode mine down the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: W. W. Ewin

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My son is 5 years old and he loves this dump truck. He has gone through so many dump truck toys over the years because he likes to play with them outside. This one seems like it will hold up much better since the dump part is metal. Kinda wish the whole truck was metal but still great
customer_reviews.author: Nervous_panda

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super nice toy dump truck. Even after reading the size I was surprised at how big it actually is for the price I paid. It was purchased as a gift, but I’m sure the child I purchased it for will love it. It is metal and looks like it is going to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Akposey

customer_reviews.title: It's a hit, although "steel" title is a bit misleading
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to our 3-year-old grandson for Christmas and he loves it! Little disappointed that the only steel part is the bed. We'll see how it holds up, as it's going to get some heavy use outside in the sandbox :)
customer_reviews.author: ginag429

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Toy
customer_reviews.text: My baby pushes this thing around the house all day long with toys (and other household items) in it. Definitely a favorite, and not something that’s sold in stores
customer_reviews.author: Luke Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: My annual Christmas toy donation EVERY year!
customer_reviews.text: In honor of my favorite police TV show, Adam-12, I donate a yellow dump truck each year to the local police toy drive. I'm sure this makes some young child VERY happy! It's VERY sturdy and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Haynie

customer_reviews.title: Toddler boys favorite toy.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old toddler loves this truck so much. He runs back and forth throughout the house with it. He loads his toys and sippy cup in it as well. We even put his 11 month old little sister in the back and she loved riding in it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for Christmas. He really likes it and I remember my son having one when he was little and he played with it all the time. He loves trucks.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Classic Tonka Truck was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Classic Tonka truck! This was a hit when we brought it out for my sons 1st birthday! Multiple people wanted to know where we found a classic steel tonka truck, I told them: Amazon! My one year old loves pushing it around everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: KikaJo81

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: My brother had this toy growing up and I’ve bought it twice already to gift because it’s awesome. Big, heavy duty, cool.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Memories
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as the old ones from the 90s like the ones I had growing up pass on the great stuff and memories
customer_reviews.author: Dominik

customer_reviews.title: go tonka
customer_reviews.text: husband got it for our son and all I have to say is wow...the toy it's big and will survive an active toddler would love to have a yard for him to play with it
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Chin

customer_reviews.title: They are heavy duty and a favorite toy that will still be rolling for years to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these trucks for my identical twin grandsons for their first birthday. They are heavy duty and a favorite toy that will still be rolling for years to come! It's almost impossible to find trucks that are metal, but these are the real deal! I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter

customer_reviews.title: Good Toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great truck. I gave it a 4 because of the plastic parts. It used to be all metal and the tires were rubber not plastic. The trucks used to last forever, but they do pretty well now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this for my grandson he loves it took it in the backyard puts rocks in the back takes them out very sturdy the toy will last him for years
customer_reviews.author: keith Norris

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: These are the best toys. Super durable. We have several for our 3 boys. We leave them outside. Put them in the garage when it rains so they won't rust. Lots of hours of play with these for our kids!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan A.

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat a Tonka truck!
customer_reviews.text: Traditional steel dump truck. Made well and obviously durable. My grandson loves to put rocks in the bed and drive it around outside or action figures in the house to give them a ride. Worth the money for sure!
customer_reviews.author: ROSEA

customer_reviews.title: Tonka. NOT!
customer_reviews.text: When you order a metal tonal truck you expect to get a tonal truck not a fake!
customer_reviews.author: jamie j

customer_reviews.title: I love that the bed is metal
customer_reviews.text: It is a hit with my kid. He loves it. I love that the bed is metal. I dislike that everything but the bed is plastic. I feel like there was some deceptive advertising as I thought it was all metal.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I am never sure if I am rating the item or the transaction but in the case both were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene R. Starkey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: My nephews, who are now teenagers, has dump trucks just like these as babies.I was on the hunt for one for my son and I wasn’t disappointed.We are so happy with the quality, though it is a little smaller than I thought it would be.His dump truck is one of his favorite toys.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Good size sturdy truck! Bought this as a gift and it was easy to wrap with the packaging it came in. The truck seems like it will hold up nice!
customer_reviews.author: Doll

customer_reviews.title: Plastic, not all steel!
customer_reviews.text: This dump truck is not all steel! I was furious when I opened the box delivered only to find a plastic dump truck with a steel dump bed. Reading the item description, I was lead to believe that this truck was all steel, just as the other classic dump truck that I own is. I am very disappointed in this false advertising from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: Metal and old school
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old loves this truck. It is well made and sturdy. We had one when I was little and this is as close as I could to replacing it. Plus, it was a great price!
customer_reviews.author: D. McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: A great buy! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love these trucks. My husband played with them as a child and we decided to start of with this truck for our kids. We bought it from Amazon Warehouse for $16 and are very impressed! There was absolutely nothing wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna L

customer_reviews.title: More plastic than metal.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that the truck isn’t all metal like the old Tonka trucks. Only the dump bed portion is metal—the rest is all plastic (and a soft plastic at that). If I had known this, I would have purchased an all-plastic dump truck for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: SandyJean

customer_reviews.title: Great for outside use
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this truck. Great for outside use, but recommend putting some care into limiting exposure to rain. We've only had it a year and there are some spots starting to rot.. I'll need to sand and paint soon. Strong enough that my 4yo can ride on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jabo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: No complaints from me or my little boy this was a gift for. He loves the dump truck and I love the quality. It is tough! I don't see him breaking this toy!
customer_reviews.author: HokieHi

customer_reviews.title: tough toy and looks great in person
customer_reviews.text: tough toy and looks great in person. this is a toy that you have to be imaginative with and my son is not there yet, but it will be around when he is ready. it doesn't make any sounds just a good tough truck for a rough and touch kid. this toy will definitely out last all the toys you bought for Christmas. lol!
customer_reviews.author: latasha

customer_reviews.title: Happy kid
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy my grandson was very happy with his truck.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kids Birthday
customer_reviews.text: Wow wow wow flashbacks came to my Mind Tonka this toys its Kids proof for sure as Tonka toys My son is crazy with it
customer_reviews.author: JoeAlvaS

customer_reviews.title: this is what you need for rough toddlers and beyond
customer_reviews.text: It's not broken yet. Not identical to decades ago but very durable and good. Its changed but not ruined by time.
customer_reviews.author: loktai

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: A well constructed metal truck. My 4 year old grandson loved it. He and his 3 year old sister take turns sitting in the dump bed and being pushed around the house. Always found Tonka products to be well built.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Butler

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful truck!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to give this to my son for Christmas last year. It’s still looking new and he has played with it a lot! Love it’s not made cheap!
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Total Classic!
customer_reviews.text: This is the classic toy that most boys should have, but hold onto it until they are older as a steel toy may be a little to dangerous for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The Easter bunny brought this and my kiddo loves it! I love that it has a steel bed! Yes most of it is plastic but that just means less rust when it gets left outside lol
customer_reviews.author: london

customer_reviews.title: He plays a lot with the dump truck!
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my husband’s nephew and it’s really a strong dump track,worth the money spend!

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: They opened their gift and took off. Great gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Madame Curie

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable
customer_reviews.text: This truck holds up to constant abuse from my 2 and 3-year-olds. It’s been driven through many varieties of terrain, including sand boxes and mud puddles, and has been exposed to the elements. They even push it around with their entire weight on it, but it still withstands all of their attempts to destroy it. A quality, well-made toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Tonka Classic Steel Mighty Dump Truck Vehicle, Single, Standard Packaging
product_meta.description: The Tonka classic steel mighty dump truck is built for hauling! This sturdy, steel construction vehicle is ready for the toughest loading jobs. Move the bed up and down to trigger its unloading action! Constructed with steel and guaranteed for life! Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Freewheeling feature for movement
feature_bullets: Built Tonka tough with sturdy steel construction.
Features a movable steel bed for dumping!
Stickers on vehicle may vary from shown. material: Plastic.
